articles.description: Liverpool score twice in final 10 minutes to beat Newcastle, Man City edge out Sheffield United and Aston Villa cruise past Burnley, plus transfer news.
articles.title: Premier League reaction as Liverpool & Man City win late on

articles.description: The mother of Spanish football federation president Luis Rubiales goes on a hunger strike because of the "inhuman hunt" against her son.
articles.title: Rubiales' mother on hunger strike over kiss row

articles.description: Former world number one Caroline Wozniacki, who retired in 2020 and now has two children, makes her Grand Slam return at the US Open.
articles.title: 'You only live once' - Wozniacki on US Open comeback

articles.description: Great Britain's Keely Hodgkinson wins her second consecutive silver medal in the 800m at the World Athletics Championships as Kenya's Mary Moraa takes gold.
articles.title: GB's Hodgkinson wins 800m silver as Moraa takes gold

articles.description: Norway's Viktor Hovland hits a superb bogey-free seven-under-par 63 to win the PGA Tour's season-ending Tour Championship by five shots in Atlanta.
articles.title: Hovland wins season-ending Tour Championship

articles.description: Max Verstappen's achievements in dominating this season are being "underestimated", according to two-time world champion Fernando Alonso.
articles.title: Verstappen's success underestimated - Alonso

articles.description: Simone Biles breaks a 90-year record by winning her eighth all-around title at the US Gymnastics Championships, less than a month after returning to competition.
articles.title: Biles makes history with record eighth US title

articles.description: Watch as Match of the Day 2's Alan Shearer analyses how Jurgen Klopp's substitutions helped 10-man Liverpool engineer an incredible 2-1 comeback victory over Newcastle.
articles.title: How Klopp's changes transformed Liverpool - MOTD analysis

articles.description: Newcastle United midfielder Elliot Anderson receives his first Scotland call-up for next month's Euro 2024 qualifier in Cyprus and the friendly with England at Hampden.
articles.title: Scotland include Anderson for Cyprus & England

articles.description: Keely Hodgkinson, Katarina Johnson-Thompson and Josh Kerr will be among the British athletes targeting Olympic glory after world golds.
articles.title: High hopes for Paris as British stars shine at Worlds
